name: ngx-fi-utils
description: Various utilities and wrappers for angular projects

scripts.lint-all: ng l ngx-fi-lodash && ng l ngx-fi-moment && ng l ngx-fi-validator && npm run lint-ngx-fi-online && npm run ng l ngx-fi-fuse
scripts.generate-all: npm run generate-ngx-fi-lodash && npm run generate-ngx-fi-moment && npm run generate-ngx-fi-validator && npm run generate-ngx-fi-online && npm run generate-ngx-fi-fuse
scripts.generate-ngx-fi-lodash: npm run lint-ngx-fi-lodash && ng build ngx-fi-lodash && cd ./dist/ngx-fi-lodash && npm pack && move ngx-fi-*.tgz ../../packages/ngx-fi-lodash
scripts.generate-ngx-fi-moment: npm run lint-ngx-fi-moment && ng build ngx-fi-moment && cd ./dist/ngx-fi-moment && npm pack && move ngx-fi-*.tgz ../../packages/ngx-fi-moment
scripts.generate-ngx-fi-validator: npm run lint-ngx-fi-validator && ng build ngx-fi-validator && cd ./dist/ngx-fi-validator && npm pack && move ngx-fi-*.tgz ../../packages/ngx-fi-validator
scripts.generate-ngx-fi-online: npm run lint-ngx-fi-online && npm run test-ngx-fi-online && ng build ngx-fi-online && cd ./dist/ngx-fi-online && npm pack && move ngx-fi-*.tgz ../../packages/ngx-fi-online
scripts.generate-ngx-fi-fuse: npm run lint-ngx-fi-fuse && ng build ngx-fi-fuse && cd ./dist/ngx-fi-fuse && npm pack && move ngx-fi-*.tgz ../../packages/ngx-fi-fuse
